Title: Seeking a Process Data Scientist to our Process Science Analytics Team
Place: Hillerød, Capital Region of Denmark, Denmark
Description:
We are looking for a Process Data Scientist to help us translate our manufacturing and supporting processes pain points, into first class Manufacturing Intelligence Use Cases via data analytics /science. If you thrive by being a key stakeholder in establishing the site’s process data, then you just might be a great colleague to our highly skilled Process Analytics organization.

Your New Role

The Process Data Scientist is a critical role within FUJIFILM Diosynth Biotechnologies Denmark (FDBD) as the business is expanding and we are introducing new technologies, programs, and customers continuously – with data excellence being one of the mission enablers. We will provide ongoing support to our new site in Holly Springs, NC, USA.

You will be a key stakeholder in establishing the site’s process data usage and analytics value chain, whilst being the owner of already validated monitoring applications, e.g., an electronic chromatogram review setup and machine learning batch performance models. We continuously strive to identify opportunities to improve internal systems and practices, as well as provide direction and development of digital/data offerings to our partners.

Your Primary Tasks Will Be


Support process investigations, root cause analysis, optimization with data support and analysis
Process Analytics systems support to manufacturing across all product modalities
Develop, validate, and deploy ETL pipelines and help build the process data ecosystem
Support process trending, continued process verification (CPV) and annual product reviews (APQR)
Support development of applications with models for process characterization and scale-up/out
Develop, validate, and deploy multivariate batch monitoring models
Support innovation and systems improvement initiatives in the Process Analytics space



The Skills & Knowledge We Hope You Possess


You have a master’s degree in in a relevant science or engineering discipline (i.e., Engineering, Bioinformatics or similar) with 2 years of industry experience or a Bachelors in the same area with 4 years of industry experience.
You have working-knowledge of SQL and a solid understanding of data science and the Python data science ecosystem (NumPy, SciPy, pandas, Scikit-learn, Jupyter Notebook).
Familiarity with SIMCA-online, TIBCO Statistica, Visual Basic and Git version control are a plus.
It would be considered an advantage if you also have GMP experience, having worked on delivering GxP applications.



We value candidates who are naturally curious, greet people with a smile, and possess a can-do attitude. You demonstrate humility and respect for those around you. As someone who is pragmatic and structured, you have a keen focus on quality and enjoy working independently. You are proactive in dynamic entrepreneurial environments. Most importantly, you possess strong communication skills and appreciate the support of a cross-functional team.

The team

The Process Analytics team is embedded in the Process Science (PS) organization and provide leadership and subject matter expertise to existing production-ready process data business processes, while also seeking to develop and introduce new Manufacturing Intelligence in clinical, PPQ and commercial processes primarily in the large-scale Cell Culture manufacturing.

We are a growing team of highly professional dedicated scientists/engineers with data management and data science expertise - but also broad experience within pharmaceutical development and manufacturing of monoclonal antibodies.

The work environment is international and informal. The role is based in our Hillerød, Denmark location, and we offer a flexible work arrangement where a defined number of working hours can be carried out in the employee’s home.

We keep a high pace and focus on a vital work life balance while having fun. We put a strong emphasis on psychological safety through trust and empowerment within our teams and hope that this is something that speaks to you as well.

Application

Has this sparked your interest, then please upload your CV and cover letter as soon as possible, as we screen candidates on a continuous basis and call in for interviews.

The Company

FUJIFILM Diosynth Biotechnologies is an industry-leading Biologics Contract Development and Manufacturing Organization (CDMO) with locations in Hillerød, Denmark, Teesside, UK, RTP, North Carolina and College Station, Texas, USA. We use our skills, dedication, and ambition to enable impact for the world’s most innovative biotech and biopharma companies reimagining healthcare’s potential. We work across the entire lifecycle of our customers’ products – enabling success throughout. Every cure, vaccine, biologic, and advancement we contribute to starts with our people and our passion. We fuel one another’s passion, help accelerate progress, expand capabilities, strengthen innovation, and improve processes to improve lives.

We offer the chance to be part of a global workplace where passion, drive and commitment are met with opportunities for professional and personal development. Deeply committed to diversity and inclusion, we ensure that everyone no matter their background or gender has an opportunity to develop. We take pride in enriching our communities, caring for our environment, and cultivating a world of opportunity for future generations.

We aim to foster a collaborative, innovative and rewarding environment, where diverse perspectives and people come together united by a common purpose and shared values. We pursue our fullest potential as individual contributors and team members. We strive to be the employer of choice and offer a competitive compensation and benefit package.

FUJIFILM Diosynth Biotechnologies Denmark (FDBD) is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, colour, religion, sex, national origin, disability, sexual orientation, gender identify or any other protected class.

To all agencies: Please, no phone calls or emails to any employee of FUJIFILM about this requisition. All resumes submitted by search firms/employment agencies to any employee at FUJIFILM via-email, the internet or in any form and/or method will be deemed the sole property of FUJIFILM, unless such search firms/employment agencies were engaged by FUJIFILM for this requisition and a valid agreement with FUJIFILM is in place. In the event a candidate who was submitted outside of the FUJIFILM agency engagement process is hired, no fee or payment of any kind will be paid.

Title: Machine Learning Platform Engineer
Description:
Are you passionate about Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence and excited to work at the intersection of Cloud Infrastructure and cutting-edge ML/AI solutions in a fast paced business? This is your chance to embed with our Fundamental Modelling (FM) team, developing large-scale ML/AI models using and supplying terabytes of meteorological data to drive insights and competitive advantage in energy trading.




About the Role

We’re seeking a hands-on ML Platform Engineer to work directly with the Head of Fundamental Modelling as a strategic business partner, while reporting to the Manager of Cloud Development ensuring an anchor in the wider technical organization.

Your mission: Enable our FM and Quant Trading teams to focus entirely on sophisticated modelling and meteorology solutions by ensuring platform infrastructure and operations run seamlessly in the background.

You’ll help maintain and expand our hybrid infrastructure using Azure Cloud and on-premise high-performance computing (HPC) resources, ensuring the right balance of performance, agility, reliability and cost for each use case.




Key Responsibilities

Develop and manage the ML platform for large-scale data and complex ML models.
Implement MLOps best practices to streamline development and deployment.
Optimize the platform’s performance and efficiency across Azure Cloud and on-premise HPC.
Ensure smooth transition of ML and Big Data applications from development to production.
Proactively solve infrastructure issues and improve platform reliability.
Partner with data scientists and engineers to enable successful deployment and monitoring.
Drive platform improvements to meet business and technical needs.




We expect that you are familiar with several of the topics below and are ready to embrace learning the rest in your job with us!

Experience building and maintaining ML platforms in data-intensive environments.
Strong experience with Azure Cloud, Docker, and Kubernetes.
Expertise in GPU-based ML training and high-memory computing.
Experience with HPC infrastructure and cloud integration.
Ability to assess and recommend the best infrastructure solutions.
Strong problem-solving and communication skills.
Experience with time-series or geospatial data is a plus.




Personal Competencies

Collaborative: You work well with data scientists and engineers to solve challenges together.
Business-driven: You seek to understand business needs and deliver effective solutions.
Proactive: You anticipate problems and address them before they escalate.
Customer-focused: You ensure the FM team can rely on the platform without friction.
Adaptable: You adjust strategies based on changing business and technical requirements.
Clear communicator: You explain technical concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.




Did we pique your interest?

Click the "APPLY" button - we are continuously looking for talented people to join our team.

Show more

Title: Machine Learning/AI konsulenter
Place: Copenhagen, Capital Region of Denmark, Denmark
Description:
Er du konsulent med erfaring i Machine Learning/AI, og er du bosiddende i Danmark, med minimum 5 års professionel erfaring fra IT relaterede projekter ude hos kunder, og har du ikke før haft kontakt med os, så kunne et partnerskab med emagine måske være interessant for dig?

emagine er et high-end konsulenthus med hovedkvarter i København, der leverer skræddersyede ydelser og ekspertise ved brug af et netværk af ekspertkonsulenter.

Som freelance konsulent kan du blive inddraget i opgaver, enten som ekspertrådgiver, som en del af et emagine team, eller som en betroet konsulent ude på opgave i en af vores kunders organisation.

I Danmark har vi kontorer i København, Aarhus og Aalborg, med over 900 konsulenter ude på opgaver lige nu. I Europa har vi over 5.000 konsulenter på opgave.

Tilmeld dig vores database og få muligheden for at arbejde med nogle af de mest innovative virksomheder i branchen.

At blive medlem af vores konsulentdatabase har mange fordele, herunder:


Adgang til en bred vifte af projekter med internationale virksomheder, så du kan anvende dine færdigheder og ekspertise til projekter, der betyder noget.
Opgaver, der matcher dine færdigheder og ekspertise, hvilket sikrer, at du arbejder på projekter, der stemmer overens med dine styrker.
Kurser og kompetenceudvikling på alle niveauer med særlig erfaring inden for undervisning i projekt- program- og porteføljeledelse.
Muligheder for at udvide din portefølje af projekter og fremme din karriere


Som konsulent med Machine Learning/AI kompetencer, bør du have erfaring med en del af følgende:


Artifical Intelligence (AI)
Machine Learning (ML)
Retrieval-augmented generation (RAG)
Python
Deep Learning
SQL
Neurale Netværk
Large Language Model (LLM)
Microsoft Azure AI Studio
AutoGen
Docker
R
Algoritmer
NLP Engineering
Kubernetes
Show more

Title: Graduate Program 2025 - Data Science & Analytics
Place: Ballerup Municipality, Capital Region of Denmark, Denmark
Description:
Are you looking to kick off your career journey?

Do you like the idea of joining the European PayTech?




If so, you are at the right place!




Our graduate program offers you the chance to create your unique career path within our diverse international team, operating in more than 25 countries. Rotate among different departments, learn from experienced professionals, and make a difference by working on real business cases.




About the program

Our Graduate Program is more than a learning path - it's a journey where you will work on real business cases and have a direct impact on business results.




What can you expect?

Permanent position in one of the business departments from the start of your employment.
Two rotations between different business departments during the 12-month program.
Project Management and Communication training path after the first six months.
Continuous learning and skill improvement through structured training sessions at our Digital PayTech University.
Opportunity to develop business ideas, implement them, and build your network of stakeholders within a group of highly skilled business leaders from all over Europe.




Exciting Opportunities in Data Science and Analytics

As part of our Data Science and Analytics team, you will contribute to data-driven decision-making in the Paytech industry. You'll work in positions such as Data Scientist, Data Engineer, and BI Data Engineer.




In this department, you'll analyse large datasets, transform data into insights, develop predictive models, and create data visualisations to support business strategies. This role offers the opportunity to work with cutting-edge tools and technologies, enhancing your analytical skills and significantly impacting our company's success.




As part of our selection process, the top candidates will be invited to participate in an exciting hackathon at our office location. This is a fantastic opportunity to showcase your skills, collaborate with peers, and potentially secure a spot on our team. Stay tuned for more details!




What makes you stand out as the ideal participant for this program?

If you see yourself in the description that follows, you should definitely take the first step and apply!

You have a master's degree in Engineering, STEM or Economics & Business, graduated within the last 12 months or will graduate in 2025.
You are a career starter with no more than one year of working experience.
You are fluent in English and in the local language of the country you are applying for (any additional language is beneficial).
You can easily imagine working in an international environment and actively collaborating with colleagues from all over Europe (if you have study or work-related international experience from abroad, that will be considered a beneficial qualification).
You are committed to your work, have an exciting university career with proven great results, enjoy learning new things, feel confident to own projects by yourself and like being part of a team.
For you, formal training is a starting point - you always look for more and want to make a difference in everything you work on.




Apply Now!

Don't miss out on this amazing opportunity. Apply today and discover what's in it for you!




We are committed to creating a diverse culture where talents from all walks of life can feel like they truly belong. By applying to our Graduate Program, you're one step closer to joining us.




We're excited to learn more about you!

Show more

Title: Senior Data Scientist i AI & Data Innovation
Place: Copenhagen, Capital Region of Denmark, Denmark
Description:
Job Description

Hvem er vi hos AI & Data Innovation

AI & Data Innovation er en del af Operational Excellence i Danica, og vi er dedikeret til at støtte forretningsvækst og effektivitet gennem AI- og datadrevne løsninger. Vi arbejder tæt sammen med forskellige afdelinger for at identificere muligheder for AI og datainnovation og sikre, at vores løsninger opfylder regulatoriske og forretningsmæssige krav. Vores fokus ligger på at levere effektfulde løsninger, der imødekommer behov inden for livs- og pensionssektoren.

Hvordan ser teamet ud

Vores team, AI & Data Innovation, arbejder målrettet på at identificere, udvikle og implementere innovative AI-løsninger, der forbedrer forretningsprocesser og skaber værdi for Danica. Vi spiller en central rolle i at fremme AI-agendaen og samarbejder tæt med teams på tværs af organisationen, herunder kolleger i Indien, for at skabe integrerede løsninger, der understøtter forretningsenheder og kundebehov. Vores team er dynamisk og samarbejdende, hvor erfaringsudveksling og konstant læring er centrale elementer. Vi værdsætter en uformel omgangstone, hvor arbejde kombineres med socialt samvær.

Hvordan ser rollen ud?

Som Data Scientist Hos AI & Data Innovation Vil Du Spille En Central Rolle i At Fremme AI-agendaen. Du Vil Være Med Til At Identificere Og Evaluere Nye AI-muligheder Inden For Forretningsområderne. Dine Primære Ansvarsområder Vil Hertil Inkludere


Udvikle Proof of Concepts (POCs) for at demonstrere værdien af AI i forretningsprocesser, samt udarbejde nødvendig dokumentation og identificere skalerbarhed.
Sikre god datakvalitet i samarbejde med forretningsområderne.
Samarbejde med vores indiske kolleger i udvikling og implementering af vores AI- og dataløsninger i forretningen.
Dyrke stærke relationer med dataspecialister og forretningseksperter på tværs af organisationen.
Kommunikere resultater og fund til interessenter
Holde teamet opdateret med de seneste teknologiske fremskridt inden for AI.


Hvem leder vi efter?

Vi Søger En Motiveret Erfaren Data Scientist, Der Har Relevant Erhvervserfaring Med Anvendelse Af ML-modeller Og Gerne GenAI-modeller i Forretningsprocesser. Du Har En Videregående Uddannelse Inden For Relevante Områder Og En Interesse For De Nyeste Teknologier Inden For ML Og AI. Analytiske Færdigheder Og Nysgerrighed Er Essentielle For At Udforske Nye Tilgange Og Se Tingene Udefra Med Et ML Og AI Perspektiv. Hertil Leder Vi Efter En Kandidat Med Følgende Kvalifikationer


3+ års erfaring inden for advanced analytics eller data science (fordelagtigt indenfor finans- eller forsikringsbranchen).
Erfaring med at udvikle POCs for at demonstrere værdien i AI
Du kan forklare tekniske aspekter for aktører på alle niveauer og er proaktiv og løsningsorienteret, med en stærk interesse for innovation og teknologi.
Du er struktureret og fokuseret på at anvende de rette værktøjer, med evnen til at forstå både detaljen og helheden.
Stærk erfaring med Python og fortrolig med SQL
Tidligere erfaring med cloud-tjenester som AWS vil være en stor fordel
Evne til at kommunikere effektivt på engelsk.


Har vi fanget din interesse?

Send dit CV og ansøgning snarest, da vi løbende afholder interviews. Har du spørgsmål til rollen, er du velkommen til at kontakte Thomas Mogensen Dyerberg, Head of AI & Data Innovation, på telefon +45 31 18 44 48 eller via e-mail på tmd@danicapension.dk .
Show more

Hvordan ser teamet ud

Vores team, AI & Data Innovation, arbejder målrettet på at identificere, udvikle og implementere innovative AI-løsninger, der forbedrer forretningsprocesser og skaber værdi for Danica. Vi spiller en central rolle i at fremme AI-agendaen og samarbejder tæt med teams på tværs af organisationen, herunder kolleger i Indien, for at skabe integrerede løsninger, der understøtter forretningsenheder og kundebehov. Vores team er dynamisk og samarbejdende, hvor erfaringsudveksling og konstant læring er centrale elementer. Vi værdsætter en uformel omgangstone, hvor arbejde kombineres med socialt samvær.

Hvordan ser rollen ud?

Som Data Scientist Hos AI & Data Innovation Vil Du Spille En Central Rolle i At Fremme AI-agendaen. Du Vil Være Med Til At Identificere Og Evaluere Nye AI-muligheder Inden For Forretningsområderne. Dine Primære Ansvarsområder Vil Hertil Inkludere

  • Udvikle Proof of Concepts (POCs) for at demonstrere værdien af AI i forretningsprocesser, samt udarbejde nødvendig dokumentation og identificere skalerbarhed.
  • Sikre god datakvalitet i samarbejde med forretningsområderne.
  • Samarbejde med vores indiske kolleger i udvikling og implementering af vores AI- og dataløsninger i forretningen.
  • Dyrke stærke relationer med dataspecialister og forretningseksperter på tværs af organisationen.
  • Kommunikere resultater og fund til interessenter
  • Holde teamet opdateret med de seneste teknologiske fremskridt inden for AI.

Hvem leder vi efter?

Vi Søger En Motiveret Erfaren Data Scientist, Der Har Relevant Erhvervserfaring Med Anvendelse Af ML-modeller Og Gerne GenAI-modeller i Forretningsprocesser. Du Har En Videregående Uddannelse Inden For Relevante Områder Og En Interesse For De Nyeste Teknologier Inden For ML Og AI. Analytiske Færdigheder Og Nysgerrighed Er Essentielle For At Udforske Nye Tilgange Og Se Tingene Udefra Med Et ML Og AI Perspektiv. Hertil Leder Vi Efter En Kandidat Med Følgende Kvalifikationer

  • 3+ års erfaring inden for advanced analytics eller data science (fordelagtigt indenfor finans- eller forsikringsbranchen).
  • Erfaring med at udvikle POCs for at demonstrere værdien i AI
  • Du kan forklare tekniske aspekter for aktører på alle niveauer og er proaktiv og løsningsorienteret, med en stærk interesse for innovation og teknologi.
  • Du er struktureret og fokuseret på at anvende de rette værktøjer, med evnen til at forstå både detaljen og helheden.
  • Stærk erfaring med Python og fortrolig med SQL
  • Tidligere erfaring med cloud-tjenester som AWS vil være en stor fordel
  • Evne til at kommunikere effektivt på engelsk.

Har vi fanget din interesse?

Send dit CV og ansøgning snarest, da vi løbende afholder interviews. Har du spørgsmål til rollen, er du velkommen til at kontakte Thomas Mogensen Dyerberg, Head of AI & Data Innovation, på telefon +45 31 18 44 48 eller via e-mail på tmd@danicapension.dk .

Title: Coders - AI Training [Remote]
Description:
Requirements

This is a great opportunity to supplement your income while looking for longer or more full-time work, all while contributing to the development of new AI models using your domain expertise!

Our client has hired over 100 BT Talent and intends to hire hundreds more!

You’ll have the flexibility to work as much or as little as you choose - 20hrs/week is suggested, but not a limit. Start working in as little as 48 hours.




What to expect: If qualified, you’ll complete an ID verification & be invited to complete a 30-minute technical interview, typically scheduled within 48 hours of being invited. The interview will consist of technicals, choosing from: JS, Java, C++, and Python. If you successfully pass the interview, you’ll be approved and able to begin work ASAP. Otherwise, the next step will be to complete an async rating & writing assessment.

In both scenarios, you will be compensated for successfully completing the assessment, up to $175.




Required qualifications:

Complete fluency in the English language is required. You should be able to describe code and abstract information in a clear way.
Proficiency working with any of the the following:
Python, Java, JavaScript / TypeScript, SQL, C/C++/C# and/or HTML

Preferred qualifications:

Bachelor's and/or Master's degree in Computer Science or equivalent. Students are welcome.
Proficiency working with any of the the following (in addition to the languages above):
Swift, Ruby, Rust, Go, NET, Matlab, PHP, HTML, DART, R, Apex, and Shell
Data Science experience

Note: Scale AI is partnering with Remotasks for this opportunity




What You’ll Be Working On

Our client has partnered with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code.

Example projects might include:
Evaluating the quality of AI-generated code, including human-readable summaries of your rationale
Solve coding problems, writing functional and efficient code
Optimize code to run at maximum efficiency
Writing robust test cases to confirm code works efficiently and effectively
Writing human-readable summaries of coding problems
Writing explanations of how code can solve problems and evaluate various solution approaches

No previous experience with AI necessary! You will receive detailed instructions on what is expected of you after you complete the application and verification process.

Title: Student Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
Join a world of energy as MFT Energy's new Student Machine Learning Engineer

At MFT Energy, we are at the forefront of energy trading, driving market efficiency, and facilitating the green transition. We are seeking a talented student machine learning engineer to join our ambitious Intraday team trading European power. Collaborate with experienced professionals, who are dedicated to excellence every day.

About The Role

As a Student Machine Learning Engineer, you will play a pivotal role in our dynamic Intraday team. You will work alongside highly skilled quantitative analysts, machine-learning experts, execution-algo developers, system developers, and traders.

Your work will directly influence our critical frameworks, positioning you at the heart of our operations. You will be instrumental in ensuring that the data flows continuously, the frameworks are robust, and general systems are always running. Over time, your responsibilities will grow as we believe in responsibility being a key driver for your success.

Your Key Responsibilities


Maintain and extend machine learning frameworks.
Acquire and maintain data from external sources.


Your Qualifications And Personal Skills


Studying: Computer Science, Science, Economics, Engineering, Finance, or similar.
A general interest in technology and systems.
Experience with Python and standard libraries such as Pandas, NumPy, etc.
Familiarity with Linux environments and containerization tools such as Docker.
Experience with common software technologies such as Git, SQL, Azure, and general observability tools is considered a plus.
A proactive approach and an eye for detail.
The ability to work independently and structure your workload.
Fluent in English, both spoken and written, as our company language is English.


Above all, we cherish passion and creativity. If yo have made hobby projects, feel free to share them.

Working in MFT Energy

You will be part of a young, global, and vibrant working environment in the heart of Aarhus. MFT Energy is a transparent and flat organization with entrepreneurship at heart. We are more than 190 employees working out of our headquarters in Scandinavian Center in Aarhus C and from our international offices in Türkiye, Australia, New York City, and Singapore, and several remote colleagues working from all over the world. Our mission is to empower entrepreneurs to become the best—we believe that this is done via a fair organizational structure, with the most competent people, based on the right values.

We Offer


A part-time student position with a high degree of influence and autonomy, requiring on-site presence at our Aarhus C office to foster close collaboration and learning
A competitive and entrepreneurial work environment.
Professional and committed colleagues with great ambitions.
Great employee benefits and a people-centered leadership approach.
A celebrative work environment, a modern workplace, and an entrepreneurial, professional culture.


Make the Most of Your Talent! Join us!

If you believe there is a fit between our values and your aspirations, we look forward to receiving your application, accompanied by a CV, a short cover letter, and your transcript. For questions, please contact career@mft-energy.com.

Deadline: As soon as possible.

Start date: Flexible.

We will be screening candidates on an ongoing basis.

As a global and independent energy trading hub, we specialize in power, gas, and environmentals trading 24/7 in 41 countries. At MFT Energy, we innovate energy trading through our people and technology, supported by our unique partner model. Our belief is that fostering a sense of ownership among employees is the most effective way to advance our business.
Show more

Title: Data Scientist, Computer Vision
Place: Copenhagen Municipality, Capital Region of Denmark, Denmark
Description:
Do you want to develop computer vision and machine learning solutions for closing the gap between plan and reality for large scale construction projects, with the goal of minimizing waste through digitalization?

Your new role

Bringing data from offices to the construction site using 3D BIM models has long been part of our core expertise here at Dalux. Now, as one of the next steps in our effort to digitalize the construction industry, we are working to bring data from the construction site back into the office using modern Computer Vision techniques.

As a Data Scientist in our Computer Vision section, you will develop and deploy deep learning models to improve the understanding, alignment and correspondence between 3D models of the construction site and video data gathered using our vSLAM system. As part of an R&D team, you will work on discovery of new solutions through research and rapid prototyping, and translating the findings into delivery of high quality solutions to complex computer vision problems.

Your background

We believe you…


Have a solid theoretical foundation from a degree in computer science, engineering, IT or similar.
Have a hands-on experience with software development using C++, Python or C#. It is important that you have reached solid coding standards and strive for continuous improvement.
Have a machine learning experience or trained in the area. Hands-on experience with PyTorch and MLFlow is a plus.
Have computer vision experience or trained in the area. Hands-on experience with OpenCV is a plus.
Can work both independently and as part of a team.


Most important is your problem-solving attitude, passion for software craftmanship, and the ambition to participate in the full lifecycle of our machine learning solutions.

Our tech...


C++
OpenGL
Python
PyTorch
MLFlow
Kubernetes


We are focused on using the right tools for the job, and as such the list of technologies may change depending on our needs and new offerings.

What To Expect As a Daluxian

In our organization the way from idea to product is short, combined with creative freedom and a high level of trust in your work, ensures that you will be able to create tangible value for our users.

You will become a part of a highly skilled team of passionate individuals driven by the wish to explore new and reshape existing technologies. As Dalux is a software company, we want half of the company to consist of Software Developers. All our software development happens at our head office at Vibenshuset in Copenhagen.

We offer...


Central location in Copenhagen, focus on work/life balance without any overtime, and no dress code.
An active social environment with monthly events and social clubs.
Flat communication in our organization, where the way from idea to product is short combined with creative freedom and a high level of trust in your work, ensures that you will be able to create tangible value for our users.
You’ll join a highly specialized, international team with room for creativity and professional growth.
Strong focus on diversity and inclusion – your ideas are heard, and opportunities are available to all.
Attractive employee benefits such as health insurance, lunch plan, coffee and fruit, free fitness facilities, and parking garage.
Focus on your development and well-being, with support for both professional goals and personal growth.


Ready for the next step

If Dalux sounds like a place where you could develop and contribute to the high-quality software, we would gladly accept your application. We will be having ongoing interviews.

If you have any questions, feel free to contact Simone Jena Berg Christensen.

Who Is Dalux

Dalux is a Danish software company founded in 2005 by Ph.D. Bent Dalgaard and Torben Dalgaard. Dalux’ products are aimed at making the construction industry smarter and more effective as it is the world’s 2nd largest industry and amongst the least digitalized. Our user-friendly digital tools and Building Information Modelling-technology (also known as BIM) is used in more than 160 countries globally.

We are crazy about cool technology and have experience being first movers on new tech. Our products are based on our unique 3D BIM-technology and makes use of AR - all developed entirely by Dalux.

Application deadline:

Ongoing

Title: DATA SCIENTIST TIL AI-DREVET GRØN OMSTILLING
Place: Aarhus Municipality, Central Denmark Region, Denmark
Description:
Vil du være med til at skabe fremtidens AI-løsninger og omsætte banebrydende innovation til værdi for dansk landbrug?

Hos SEGES Innovation søger vi en ambitiøs Data Scientist, som brænder for dataanalyse, AI-udvikling og for at gøre en reel forskel gennem Applied AI.

Et it-job med mening

SEGES Digital er SEGES Innovations digitale forretningsenhed. Vi er en førende organisation inden for udvikling af digitale løsninger til landbrugs- og fødevareområdet, og dedikerede til at forbedre landbrugs- og fødevaresektoren gennem innovative Digital og AI løsninger baseret på vores DataEstate.

Forretningsenheden Digital består af ca. 200 medarbejdere, der sammen med resten af SEGES Innovation er drevet af vores mission om at sikre fremtidens bæredygtige fødevarer. Det gør vi gennem forskning, innovation og digitale værktøjer, der optimerer og transformerer landbrugs- og fødevaresektoren igennem den grønne omstilling af erhvervet.

Om stillingen

I afdelingen Data & Analytics hos SEGES Innovation skaber vi værdi ved at udvikle intelligente løsninger til fremtidens landbrug. Vi overvåger dyrevelfærd i staldene ved hjælp af avanceret computer vision, holder øje med marker via satellitdata og optimerer landmandens beslutninger med præcise prognosemodeller. Vi eksperimenterer også med banebrydende generative AI-teknologier, der automatisk analyserer og håndterer store mængder tekst og dokumentation.

Som Data Scientist hos os får du mulighed for at arbejde med hele data science-livscyklussen – fra indledende analyse og feature-identifikation til avanceret modeludvikling, optimering, implementering og evaluering. Du vil få lejlighed til at arbejde med state-of-the-art teknikker inden for blandt andet computer vision, generative AI samt klassiske prædiktive modeller baseret på tabulære data. Hos os bliver du en del af et engageret team, der arbejder tæt sammen med faglige eksperter om at omsætte data til konkret værdi for landbruget.

Din rolle

Du arbejder med en varieret portefølje af projekter, hvor du anvender din ekspertise inden for dataanalyse, modellering og løsningsudvikling til at omsætte komplekse udfordringer til konkrete, værdiskabende løsninger. Du vil blive en nøgleperson i at sikre, at vores AI-drevne produkter konstant er relevante, effektive og værdiskabende for dansk landbrug.

Din rolle indebærer



Udvikling af AI-løsninger i samarbejde med faglige eksperter fra Innovationsafdelingen.
Selvstændigt ansvar for AI-projekter med fokus på dataanalyse, modeludvikling og dokumentation af resultater.
Arbejde med klassiske AI-principper, såsom supervised og unsupervised machine learning.
Håndtering af forskellige typer data, fx tidsserier, billeder, geospatiale data og tekst.
Løbende dialog, sparring og præsentation af resultater til interne interessenter.
Aktivt bidrag til kompetenceopbygning inden for AI og data science i både projekt- og produktkontekster.



Hvad vi drømmer om...

Vi ser gerne, at du har erfaring inden for data science, men lysten til at lære er vigtigere end nuværende kompetenceniveau.

Faglige kompetencer



Kendskab til datatyper som f.eks. tidsserier, geospatiale data, video/billede eller tekst.
Erfaring med Azure og/eller Databricks.
Solide kompetencer inden for Python.
Kendskab til CI/CD-principper.



Personlige kompetencer



En pragmatisk tilgang til opgaverne.
Evnen til hurtigt at tilegne dig ny viden og omsætte den til praksis.
Stærke samarbejdsevner og lyst til at være en aktiv del af et team.
En naturlig nysgerrighed og interesse for at følge med i AI-udviklingen.



Frem for alt søger vi en person med stort gåpåmod, ægte interesse for området og en stærk vilje til konstant at lære og udvikle sig.

Hvad vi tilbyder

I SEGES Innovation tilbyder vi dig en karriere med mening. Vores innovation og viden gør en stor forskel i at skabe en bæredygtig fødevareproduktion. Vores specialister arbejder med alt fra klima og miljø, planter, husdyr og digitale løsninger til vækst og vidensformidling.

Sammen bidrager vi til de løsninger, der gør landbruget og fødevareproduktionen endnu mere bæredygtig. Vi er 500 kolleger, der brænder for det, vi arbejder med. Vi omsætter for omkring 630 millioner kr. årligt.

I det digitale område af SEGES Innovation arbejder vi agilt med digitale produkt teams, der primært arbejder med SCRUM og hvis vi i al beskedenhed selv skal sige det er hamrende gode, men også kan blive bedre. Du får derfor mulighed for at sætte dit aftryk på organisationens fremtidige udvikling.

Vi tilbyder derudover en attraktiv lønpakke, fleksible arbejdsbetingelser og gode muligheder for personlig og faglig udvikling.

Ansøg nu

Lyder det interessant, og kan du se dig selv i stillingen, så upload ansøgning og dit CV via "Søg stillingen".

Vil du vide mere?

Du kan læse mere om SEGES Digital her: https://segesinnovation.dk/landing-pages/et-it-job-med-mening/

Du kan se en tv-serie om, hvordan det er at arbejde i SEGES Digital, her: https://segesinnovation.dk/landing-pages/kodernes-kamp/

Hvis du har spørgsmål, er du meget velkommen til at kontakte Director, Morten Ryberg på 2812 7341 eller på mory@seges.dk

Ved rekruttering hos SEGES Innovation prioriterer vi primært din faglige ekspertise og personlighed. Vi ser mangfoldighed som en styrke, derfor opfordres alle med de rette kompetencer til at søge - uanset etnisk tilhørsforhold, religion, kønsidentitet og alder.

SEGES Innovation er en uafhængig forsknings- og innovationsvirksomhed, der arbejder for en bæredygtig og konkurrencedygtig landbrugs- og fødevareproduktion. Vi kobler faglige indsigter med digitale teknologier, så ny viden kommer ud at virke i stalden, på marken og i hele værdikæden fra jord til bord.

Vores mange forskellige eksperter udgør et unikt fagmiljø i international topklasse med ca. 500 dedikerede kolleger, der arbejder ud fra værdierne Mod, Hjerte og Dybde og i tæt samspil med Danmarks mere end 30.000 landbrug, universiteter og uddannelsesinstitutioner, landbrugsrådgivere, fødevareproducenter, energiselskaber og myndigheder.
Show more

Vi er en førende organisation inden for udvikling af digitale løsninger til landbrugs- og fødevareområdet, og dedikerede til at forbedre landbrugs- og fødevaresektoren gennem innovative Digital og AI løsninger baseret på vores DataEstate.

Forretningsenheden Digital består af ca. 200 medarbejdere, der sammen med resten af SEGES Innovation er drevet af vores mission om at sikre fremtidens bæredygtige fødevarer. Det gør vi gennem forskning, innovation og digitale værktøjer, der optimerer og transformerer landbrugs- og fødevaresektoren igennem den grønne omstilling af erhvervet.

Om stillingen

I afdelingen Data & Analytics hos SEGES Innovation skaber vi værdi ved at udvikle intelligente løsninger til fremtidens landbrug. Vi overvåger dyrevelfærd i staldene ved hjælp af avanceret computer vision, holder øje med marker via satellitdata og optimerer landmandens beslutninger med præcise prognosemodeller. Vi eksperimenterer også med banebrydende generative AI-teknologier, der automatisk analyserer og håndterer store mængder tekst og dokumentation.

Som Data Scientist hos os får du mulighed for at arbejde med hele data science-livscyklussen – fra indledende analyse og feature-identifikation til avanceret modeludvikling, optimering, implementering og evaluering. Du vil få lejlighed til at arbejde med state-of-the-art teknikker inden for blandt andet computer vision, generative AI samt klassiske prædiktive modeller baseret på tabulære data. Hos os bliver du en del af et engageret team, der arbejder tæt sammen med faglige eksperter om at omsætte data til konkret værdi for landbruget.

Din rolle

Du arbejder med en varieret portefølje af projekter, hvor du anvender din ekspertise inden for dataanalyse, modellering og løsningsudvikling til at omsætte komplekse udfordringer til konkrete, værdiskabende løsninger. Du vil blive en nøgleperson i at sikre, at vores AI-drevne produkter konstant er relevante, effektive og værdiskabende for dansk landbrug.

Din rolle indebærer


  • Udvikling af AI-løsninger i samarbejde med faglige eksperter fra Innovationsafdelingen.
  • Selvstændigt ansvar for AI-projekter med fokus på dataanalyse, modeludvikling og dokumentation af resultater.
  • Arbejde med klassiske AI-principper, såsom supervised og unsupervised machine learning.
  • Håndtering af forskellige typer data, fx tidsserier, billeder, geospatiale data og tekst.
  • Løbende dialog, sparring og præsentation af resultater til interne interessenter.
  • Aktivt bidrag til kompetenceopbygning inden for AI og data science i både projekt- og produktkontekster.


Hvad vi drømmer om...

Vi ser gerne, at du har erfaring inden for data science, men lysten til at lære er vigtigere end nuværende kompetenceniveau.

Faglige kompetencer


  • Kendskab til datatyper som f.eks. tidsserier, geospatiale data, video/billede eller tekst.
  • Erfaring med Azure og/eller Databricks.
  • Solide kompetencer inden for Python.
  • Kendskab til CI/CD-principper.


Personlige kompetencer


  • En pragmatisk tilgang til opgaverne.
  • Evnen til hurtigt at tilegne dig ny viden og omsætte den til praksis.
  • Stærke samarbejdsevner og lyst til at være en aktiv del af et team.
  • En naturlig nysgerrighed og interesse for at følge med i AI-udviklingen.


Frem for alt søger vi en person med stort gåpåmod, ægte interesse for området og en stærk vilje til konstant at lære og udvikle sig.

Hvad vi tilbyder

I SEGES Innovation tilbyder vi dig en karriere med mening. Vores innovation og viden gør en stor forskel i at skabe en bæredygtig fødevareproduktion. Vores specialister arbejder med alt fra klima og miljø, planter, husdyr og digitale løsninger til vækst og vidensformidling.

Sammen bidrager vi til de løsninger, der gør landbruget og fødevareproduktionen endnu mere bæredygtig. Vi er 500 kolleger, der brænder for det, vi arbejder med. Vi omsætter for omkring 630 millioner kr. årligt.

I det digitale område af SEGES Innovation arbejder vi agilt med digitale produkt teams, der primært arbejder med SCRUM og hvis vi i al beskedenhed selv skal sige det er hamrende gode, men også kan blive bedre. Du får derfor mulighed for at sætte dit aftryk på organisationens fremtidige udvikling.

Vi tilbyder derudover en attraktiv lønpakke, fleksible arbejdsbetingelser og gode muligheder for personlig og faglig udvikling.

Ansøg nu

Lyder det interessant, og kan du se dig selv i stillingen, så upload ansøgning og dit CV via "Søg stillingen".

Vil du vide mere?

Du kan læse mere om SEGES Digital her: https://segesinnovation.dk/landing-pages/et-it-job-med-mening/

Du kan se en tv-serie om, hvordan det er at arbejde i SEGES Digital, her: https://segesinnovation.dk/landing-pages/kodernes-kamp/

Hvis du har spørgsmål, er du meget velkommen til at kontakte Director, Morten Ryberg på 2812 7341 eller på mory@seges.dk

Ved rekruttering hos SEGES Innovation prioriterer vi primært din faglige ekspertise og personlighed. Vi ser mangfoldighed som en styrke, derfor opfordres alle med de rette kompetencer til at søge - uanset etnisk tilhørsforhold, religion, kønsidentitet og alder.

SEGES Innovation er en uafhængig forsknings- og innovationsvirksomhed, der arbejder for en bæredygtig og konkurrencedygtig landbrugs- og fødevareproduktion. Vi kobler faglige indsigter med digitale teknologier, så ny viden kommer ud at virke i stalden, på marken og i hele værdikæden fra jord til bord.

Vores mange forskellige eksperter udgør et unikt fagmiljø i international topklasse med ca. 500 dedikerede kolleger, der arbejder ud fra værdierne Mod, Hjerte og Dybde og i tæt samspil med Danmarks mere end 30.000 landbrug, universiteter og uddannelsesinstitutioner, landbrugsrådgivere, fødevareproducenter, energiselskaber og myndigheder.

Title: Senior Data Scientist
Place: Kongens Lyngby, Capital Region of Denmark, Denmark
Description:
En personlig hilsen til “dig” – vores kommende teammedlem

Lad os spole et år frem: Vi er samlet som team for at fejre de imponerende resultater, vi har skabt sammen. De virksomhedskunder, vi samarbejder med – virksomheder inden for retail, utilities og manufacturing – deler deres historier om, hvordan vores løsninger har transformeret deres forretning, øget effektiviteten og skabt nye vækstmuligheder.




Du har været kernen i disse resultater. Du har leveret projekter med stor effekt, strømlinet komplekse processer og opbygget tillid hos vores kunder. Undervejs har du udviklet dine tekniske og rådgivningsmæssige kompetencer – hvad enten det er gennem avancerede machine learning-teknikker, evnen til at omsætte data til strategiske indsigter eller håndtering af de unikke udfordringer ved vores enterprisekunder.




Dine problemløsningsevner og innovative idéer har ikke kun skabt succes for kunderne, men også bidraget til vækst og inspiration i vores team. I dag fejrer vi ikke kun vores resultater; vi fejrer vores rejse, vores team og den banebrydende forskel, vi har skabt for alle vores kunder – sammen.




English version below




Din hverdag i Inspari

Vi brænder for at drive datadrevet transformation for vores enterprisekunder inden for retail, utilities & manufacturing. Vi fokuserer på at optimere processer og skabe målbare resultater gennem banebrydende AI- og Data Science-løsninger.




Vi tror på at give vores teams ejerskab og ansvar som selvstændige konsulenter. Vores projekter spænder fra at optimere forsyningskæder til at forbedre kundeoplevelser – alle med avancerede Data Science- og AI-teknikker som omdrejningspunkt.




Rollen

Som Senior Data Scientist får du en nøglerolle i at forme og levere avancerede løsninger til vores enterprisekunder. Du vil samarbejde tæt med kundernes interessenter for at forstå deres processer, identificere optimeringsmuligheder og implementere modeller og strategier, der skaber forretningsværdi.




Ansvarsområder og opgaver

Som erfaren konsulent og Data Scientist i Inspari vil din rolle være at drive alle faser i ML-projekter. Det indebærer b.la.:

Samarbejde med vores enterprisekunder om at identificere og forstå deres forretningsmæssige udfordringer.
Designe og implementere machine learning-modeller, algoritmer og datadrevne strategier for at optimere processer og styrke beslutningstagning.
Omsætte komplekse dataindsigter til konkrete anbefalinger for ikke-tekniske interessenter.
Lede projektteams og sikre rettidig levering af løsninger i høj kvalitet.
Agere som betroet rådgiver og guide kunder på deres datadrevne transformationsrejse.
Være mentor for yngre teammedlemmer og fremme en kultur for læring og vækst.
Ansvar for eget budget og bidrage til teamets udvikling og vækst.




Dine kvalifikationer

Vi ønsker os, at du har:

Erfaring: Minimum 5 års erfaring inden for data science eller lignende, gerne fra konsulent- eller enterprisevirksomheder.
Teknisk ekspertise: Solid erfaring med Python-programmering. Kendskab til vores primære biblioteker som Pandas, PySpark, MLFlow, scikit-learn og Dash er en fordel. Erfaring med eller grundlæggende viden om Cloud-tjenester som Microsoft Azure, Azure Machine Learning, Azure Databricks, Microsoft Fabric, Data Lake og Blob.
Forretningsforståelse: Evne til at forstå og optimere forretningsprocesser inden for retail, utility eller manufacturing.
Konsulentfærdigheder: Stærke kommunikations- og samarbejdsevner samt erfaring med kundekontakt.
Selvstændighed: Evne til at arbejde selvstændigt og lede projekter fra ide til levering.




Bemærk venligst: Hvis ovenstående lyder interessant, og du kommer med relevant erfaring til at løfte ansvaret og opgaverne, så vil vi meget gerne undersøge dine muligheder hos os.




Din tjekliste

Generelt er du godt på vej, hvis du tilmed kan genkende dig selv i nedenstående linjer:




Du er passioneret omkring nye teknologier orienteret mod Data Science & AI.
Du motiveres af at rådgive og lave tekniske løsninger for vores kunder, der optimerer deres dagligdag.
Du stortrives i arbejdet med at indsamle og klargøre data, som du kan analysere, modellere og formidle.
Du inspirerers af at indgå og bidrage i et fagligt fakultet, hvor vi i fællesskab løfter hinandens kompetenceniveau til fordel for kunder lige så vel vores egen trivsel.
Du er ambitiøs og kan lide en dynamisk arbejdsuge, hvor du får en bred eksponering til kunder og forskellige løsninger.
Du har lyst til at fortælle vidt og bredt om de mange muligheder, der åbner sig inden for DS/AI i disse år.




Hvad vi tilbyder

Et dynamisk og samarbejdsorienteret arbejdsmiljø med fokus på innovation og effekt.
Mulighed for at arbejde på forskellige projekter med stor betydning for førende enterprisevirksomheder.
En stærk kultur for faglig udvikling med adgang til træning, mentorordninger og karriereudvikling.
Konkurrencedygtig løn og attraktive personalegoder.
At blive en del af vores unikke Heartwork kultur hvor ambitioner og forventninger går hånd i hånd med passion og holdånd.




Lokation: Du tilknyttes vores kontor i Kgs. Lyngby med en hybrid arbejdsmodel.




Rejseaktivitet: Du skal forvente, at der kan være en vis rejseaktivitet.




Send os dit CV og en ansøgning:

Vi vil gerne høre om et projekt, hvor du har skabt målbar forretningsmæssig indflydelse ved hjælp af data science-teknikker.




English version:




A personal note to “You?” our future team member

Fast forward a year: We’re gathered as a team, celebrating the remarkable successes we’ve achieved together. The enterprise clients we’ve partnered with—leaders in retail, utilities, and manufacturing—are sharing how our solutions have reshaped their operations, increased efficiency, and unlocked new opportunities for growth.




You’ve been at the heart of these successes. You’ve delivered impactful projects, streamlined complex processes, and built trust with clients. Along the way, you’ve honed your technical and consulting skills—whether mastering advanced machine learning techniques, refining your ability to turn data into strategic insights, or navigating the unique challenges of enterprise-level consulting.




Your problem-solving and innovative ideas have not only driven client success but also inspired growth within our team. And today, we’re not just celebrating results; we’re celebrating our team, the journey and the pioneering difference we’ve have made for all our customers - together.




About Us

We are dedicated to driving data-driven transformation for enterprise clients in retail, utilities, and manufacturing. Our focus is on optimizing processes and delivering measurable impact through cutting-edge AI and Data Science solutions.

We believe in empowering our teams to take ownership and act as self-driven consultants. Our projects range from optimizing supply chains to enhancing customer experiences—all leveraging advanced Data Science and AI techniques.




The Role

As a Senior Data Scientist, you will play a pivotal role in shaping and delivering cutting-edge solutions for our enterprise customers. You’ll work closely with client stakeholders to understand their processes, identify opportunities for optimization, and implement models and strategies that drive business results.




Key Responsibilities

Collaborate with enterprise customers to identify and understand their business challenges.
Design and implement machine learning models, algorithms, and data-driven strategies to optimize processes and enhance decision-making.
Translate complex data insights into actionable recommendations for non-technical stakeholders.
Lead project teams, ensuring timely delivery of high-quality solutions.
Act as a trusted advisor, guiding clients through their data-driven transformation journey.
Mentor junior team members, fostering a culture of learning and growth.
Your own budget and achieving it, as well as contributing to the involvement and employment of others




What We’re Looking For

Experience: 5+ years in data science or similar, preferably in consultancy or enterprise settings.
Technical Expertise: Extensive experience with Python programming. Familiarity with some of our primary libraries is an advantage: Pandas, PySpark, MLFlow, scikit-learn, Dash. Experience with/basic knowledge of Cloud services, such as Microsoft Azure, Azure Machine Learning, Azure Databricks, Microsoft Fabric, Data Lake, and Blob.
Business Acumen: Ability to understand and optimize business processes in retail, utility, or manufacturing.
Consulting Skills: Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with experience in client-facing roles.
Self-Driven: Capable of working independently and leading projects from concept to delivery.




Please note: If the above sounds interesting and you have experience that is relevant (transferable) to take on the responsibilities and tasks, we would be happy to explore your options with us.




What We Offer

A dynamic and collaborative work environment with a focus on innovation and impact.
Opportunities to work on diverse, high-impact projects with leading enterprise clients.
A strong culture of professional growth, with access to training, mentorship, and career development.
Competitive compensation and benefits package.




Location: You will be attached to our office in Kgs. Lyngby with a hybrid work model.




Travel Activity: You should expect that there may be some travel activity.




Send us your CV and a cover letter.

We’d love to hear about a project where you drove measurable business impact using data science techniques.




Med venlig hilsen/Best regards,

Steffen Krogsgaard (Talent Acquisition Director)

Inspari - a valantic company

Title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer
Place: Copenhagen, Capital Region of Denmark, Denmark
Description:
There is no quality healthcare without a quality dialogue. Today, that dialogue is broken; we need you to help us fix it.

Doctors and nurses across the world are facing unprecedented challenges. When we meet them, they're dealing with heavy workloads, extensive paperwork, and the pressure of performing well, which in healthcare, can have dire consequences. This system is gradually undermining the passion and autonomy of our dedicated healthcare professionals, who entered this field to provide care, not to clerk.

Corti has built the world's premier AI assistant for healthcare providers. It listens in during patient dialogue, takes notes, writes summaries, journals and does quality assurance. When information is missed, or risk is high, it offers nudges and prompts to help steer the dialogue back on the right path. Entire countries trust Corti to deliver better healthcare, and our AI has already helped millions of patients, but we are just getting started.

At Corti, we are growing fast and always looking for skillful people to ensure we go in the right direction. If you enjoy working in an autonomous and collaborative team, guided by shared values and a willingness to act, iterate, and learn, then join us at Corti as a Senior Machine Learning Engineer

📌 As a Machine Learning Engineer, you will be part of our machine learning R&D team and work closely with our product teams. The machine learning R&D team consists of seasoned engineers as well as several Ph.D. students and postdocs collaborating with Danish and international universities. Our product teams are cross-functional and own product discovery and delivery end-to-end.

You can read more about our research and publications here: https://corti.ai/company/research

Our vision, products, and solutions to enrich patient consultations are described here: https://corti.ai/

In this role, you will work alongside our other machine learning engineers and researchers, developing new models, implementing state-of-the-art research outputs, and translating those outputs into tangible product outcomes. For example, you might be involved in the prototyping a new machine learning-based product feature in collaboration with other teams. Or you might work independently on taking state-of-the-art research and assessing how well it works in Corti’s domain. There are many possibilities and plenty of room for creativity and bringing in your own ideas.

The impact you'll have


Develop prototypes based on cutting-edge applied machine learning working on audio, text, and structured data sources.
Own the technical translation of state-of-the-art machine learning innovations to inform the development of new product features.
Design and implement well-defined APIs for new machine learning tools to make them available for customers and across the organization.
Participate in research ventures and drive publication at top machine learning venues or impactful digital medicine journals.
Improve healthcare globally as part of your daily work.


You'll thrive in this role if you have the following


A higher university degree or Ph.D. in computer science, computer engineering, mathematics, statistics, physics, or a related interdisciplinary field.
In-depth experience with Python and strong command of data structures and algorithms in order to contribute to production-grade code.
In-depth knowledge of one or more of the major machine learning frameworks (e.g., PyTorch or TensorFlow).
Ability to manage machine learning research projects and clearly communicate outcomes to technical and non-technical audiences.


Nice to have


Publication history at top machine learning venues (e.g., NeurIPS, ACL, or digital medicine journals) that shows that you can drive research projects.
Hands-on experience with automatic speech recognition or natural language processing.


Practicalities


The work location for this position is preferred in Copenhagen, but we can be flexible with the right candidate.
This is a full-time position, starting as soon as possible.


Ready to dive into the world of Corti? Hit that 'Apply' button, and let's start working together on reshaping the dialogue in healthcare, making a real difference for millions of patient outcomes around the world.

🤝 Bringing in top talent from all backgrounds is crucial in our pursuit to improve the world of healthcare. We encourage applications from all people and do not discriminate based on race, religion, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, and/or disability status.﻿

At Corti, experience comes in many forms, and we’re passionate about creating teams with a multitude of perspectives! If you believe your experience is close to what we’re looking for but not an exact match, we still hope you’ll consider applying!
Show more
HTML:
There is no quality healthcare without a quality dialogue. Today, that dialogue is broken; we need you to help us fix it.

Doctors and nurses across the world are facing unprecedented challenges. When we meet them, they're dealing with heavy workloads, extensive paperwork, and the pressure of performing well, which in healthcare, can have dire consequences. This system is gradually undermining the passion and autonomy of our dedicated healthcare professionals, who entered this field to provide care, not to clerk.

Corti has built the world's premier AI assistant for healthcare providers. It listens in during patient dialogue, takes notes, writes summaries, journals and does quality assurance. When information is missed, or risk is high, it offers nudges and prompts to help steer the dialogue back on the right path. Entire countries trust Corti to deliver better healthcare, and our AI has already helped millions of patients, but we are just getting started.

At Corti, we are growing fast and always looking for skillful people to ensure we go in the right direction. If you enjoy working in an autonomous and collaborative team, guided by shared values and a willingness to act, iterate, and learn, then join us at Corti as a Senior Machine Learning Engineer

📌 As a Machine Learning Engineer, you will be part of our machine learning R&D team and work closely with our product teams. The machine learning R&D team consists of seasoned engineers as well as several Ph.D. students and postdocs collaborating with Danish and international universities. Our product teams are cross-functional and own product discovery and delivery end-to-end.

You can read more about our research and publications here: https://corti.ai/company/research

Our vision, products, and solutions to enrich patient consultations are described here: https://corti.ai/

In this role, you will work alongside our other machine learning engineers and researchers, developing new models, implementing state-of-the-art research outputs, and translating those outputs into tangible product outcomes. For example, you might be involved in the prototyping a new machine learning-based product feature in collaboration with other teams. Or you might work independently on taking state-of-the-art research and assessing how well it works in Corti’s domain. There are many possibilities and plenty of room for creativity and bringing in your own ideas.

The impact you'll have

  • Develop prototypes based on cutting-edge applied machine learning working on audio, text, and structured data sources.
  • Own the technical translation of state-of-the-art machine learning innovations to inform the development of new product features.
  • Design and implement well-defined APIs for new machine learning tools to make them available for customers and across the organization.
  • Participate in research ventures and drive publication at top machine learning venues or impactful digital medicine journals.
  • Improve healthcare globally as part of your daily work.

You'll thrive in this role if you have the following

  • A higher university degree or Ph.D. in computer science, computer engineering, mathematics, statistics, physics, or a related interdisciplinary field.
  • In-depth experience with Python and strong command of data structures and algorithms in order to contribute to production-grade code.
  • In-depth knowledge of one or more of the major machine learning frameworks (e.g., PyTorch or TensorFlow).
  • Ability to manage machine learning research projects and clearly communicate outcomes to technical and non-technical audiences.

Nice to have

  • Publication history at top machine learning venues (e.g., NeurIPS, ACL, or digital medicine journals) that shows that you can drive research projects.
  • Hands-on experience with automatic speech recognition or natural language processing.

Practicalities

  • The work location for this position is preferred in Copenhagen, but we can be flexible with the right candidate.
  • This is a full-time position, starting as soon as possible.

Ready to dive into the world of Corti? Hit that 'Apply' button, and let's start working together on reshaping the dialogue in healthcare, making a real difference for millions of patient outcomes around the world.

🤝 Bringing in top talent from all backgrounds is crucial in our pursuit to improve the world of healthcare. We encourage applications from all people and do not discriminate based on race, religion, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, and/or disability status.﻿

At Corti, experience comes in many forms, and we’re passionate about creating teams with a multitude of perspectives! If you believe your experience is close to what we’re looking for but not an exact match, we still hope you’ll consider applying!

Title: AI:Xpertise Lab
Description:
Advanced AI technologies increasingly encroach on domains traditionally occupied by expert professions – doctors, architects, and lawyers. While politicians, think tanks, and researchers highlight the potential for job savings, considerable research shows challenges in using AI in expert work. Through a novel approach integrating AI development and organizational science, AI:Xpertise lab researches the technical and organizational conditions for successfully embedding AI systems in expert work.

The lab is looking for candidates for the following four stipends:

Stipend 1: PhD in AI for healthcare

This stipend revolves around building and deploying AI in health care. The main case will be automation of anesthetic pre-screenings. Potential auxiliary cases include evaluation of laparoscopic surgery and AI assistance for spinal surgery. Candidates for this stipend should have a background in software engineering or similar and have substantial experience with machine learning. All cases involve various degrees of image analysis, so computer vision experience is a requirement. Experience with large language models is a plus. Furthermore, as AI:Xpertise is about deploying AI in the real world, we are looking for people with full-stack experience: You should not only be able to create and evaluate models, you must also be able to build a user interface and deploy your systems. You must also be interested in collaborating with organizational researchers given the interdisciplinary character of AI:Xpertise.

Stipend 2: PhD in AI for architecture

This stipend revolves around building and deploying AI in architecture. The main case will be generative AI for architecture visualization, and possibly computer vision for understanding buildings. Candidates for this stipend should have a background in software engineering or similar and have substantial experience with machine learning. Experience with generative AI for image is a large advantage, and computer vision experience is a plus. Furthermore, as AI:Xpertise is about deploying AI in the real world, we are looking for people with full-stack experience: You should not only be able to create and evaluate models, you must also be able to build a user interface and deploy your systems. You must also be interested in collaborating with organizational researchers given the interdisciplinary character of AI:Xpertise.

Stipend 3: PhD in organization studies focusing on generative AI in healthcare

Large language models (LLMs) and other generative AI technologies are beginning to play a growing role in healthcare, where they are used to support clinical decision-making and patient care. While these tools promise to augment medical expertise, their integration into clinical practice poses fundamental challenges that relate to differences between expert knowledge and algorithmic reasoning. Hence, AI technologies raise important questions about how professional expertise is developed, mobilized, and recognized, in high-risk domains like medicine. As part of the AI:Xpertise lab, this PhD stipend will explore how AI tools are integrated into clinical workflows, and investigate how healthcare professionals engage with these tools, how they navigate the uncertainties and constraints of algorithmic recommendations, and how organizational routines and professional expertise co-evolve alongside new technologies. We are ideally looking for a candidate with a background in organization studies, information systems, public administration, sociology, anthropology, science and technology studies, political science, management or other related social science or humanities disciplines.

Stipend 4: PhD in organization studies focusing on generative AI in professional services

Generative AI tools are, for example, increasingly used in professional services like architecture and consulting. In fact, tasks such as image production and text generation in professional services are considered to hold great promises for being augmented. Hence, professional expertise is changing within this context, and it raises critical questions about how expertise is developed, mobilized, and recognized in such professional services. As part of the AI:Xpertise lab, this stipend will investigate how generative AI systems can be developed and embedded into professional expert services. Thus, like stipend 3, the project combines organizational research with AI development, using a comparative approach to explore both technical and organizational aspects of AI in practice. We are ideally looking for a candidate with a background in organization studies, information systems, public administration, sociology, anthropology, science and technology studies, political science, management or other related social science or humanities disciplines.

Please clearly indicate at the top of your application which of the stipendts you are applying for. The application must include a brief description (maximum 1 page) of your motivation for the stipend(s), as well as a proposed research plan (maximum 2 pages).

We expect to conduct interviews for stipend 1 and 2 in week 21 and stipend 3 and 4 in week 22.

PhD stipends are allocated to individuals who hold a Master's degree. PhD stipends are normally for a period of 3 years. It is a prerequisite for allocation of the stipend that the candidate will be enrolled as a PhD student at the relevant Doctoral School in accordance with the regulations of Ministerial Order No. 1039 of August 27, 2013 on the PhD Programme at the Universities and Certain Higher Artistic Educational Institutions. According to the Ministerial Order, the progress of the PhD student shall be assessed at regular points in time.

As for the stipends 3 and 4, there is also an option to allocate integrated PhD stipends to individuals who have not yet completed a Master’s degree and wish to begin the PhD study in connection with the Master study. Hence, a prerequisite for this type of stipend is that the candidate is enrolled in a relevant Master’s programme at AAU. Stipends of this type consist of two parts: A and B. During part A candidates are enrolled simultaneously in the Master’s programme and in the PhD programme. The stipend consists of two SU-PhD grants per month (SU= The Danish students’ Grants and Loans Scheme). One SU-PhD grant equals DKK 7,086 (2025 level). SU-PhD grants are paid for a maximum of two years. When the Master’s degree has been obtained, candidates will be employed for two years as a PhD fellow according to the present collective agreement. Part B has a maximum duration of two years. Start date of this option is 1 September 2025.

Further information

For further information about stipends as well as practical issues concerning the application procedure, please contact, for stipend 1 and 2, Associate Professor Andreas Møgelmose, Department of Architecture, Design and Media Technology, phone: +45 5090 9137, email: anmo@create.aau.dk and for stipend 3 and 4 Associate Professor Kasper Trolle Elmholt, Department of Politics and Society, phone: +45 2077 1709, email: elm@dps.aau.dk

Application

The Application Must Contain The Following


Letter of motivation that includes:
your motivation for pursuing a PhD
what you hope to learn during the PhD programme
your experience and interest in conducting research
your experience and interest in studying AI and work
Project proposal (max. 5 pages).
Describe how you plan to go about the project
Curriculum vitae
Diplomas confirming academic degrees (Master degree), including academic transcripts
Co-author statement for all enclosed co-authored publications, specifying the extent of the applicant’s contribution to the total work and signed by the co-authors

For more information on the Technical Doctoral School of IT and Design: https://www.phd.aau.dk/tech (stipend 1 and 2).

For more information on the Doctoral School of Social Sciences and Humanities: https://www.phd.aau.dk/ssh(stipend 3 and 4). Please observe the specific grade and language requirements for this Doctoral School here: https://www.phd.aau.dk/ssh/become-a-phd-student#admission-requirements

The application is only to be submitted online by using the "Apply online" button below.

Assessment

The assessment of candidates for the position will be carried out by qualified experts.

Shortlisting will be applied. This means that after the application deadline, the head of the department, with the assistance of the hiring committee, will select the applicants to be assessed. All applicants will be informed whether they have been shortlisted for assessment or not.

When the hiring process is completed, a final rejection will be sent to the applicants who are not considered for the position.

AAU wishes to reflect the diversity of society and welcomes applications from all qualified candidates regardless of personal background or belief.

The hiring process at Aalborg University may include a risk assessment as a tool to identify potential risks associated with new hires, ensuring the safety, compliance, and integrity of the workplace.

Wages and employment

Appointment and salary as a PhD fellow are according to the Ministry of Finance Circular of 15 December 2021 on the Collective Agreement for Academics in Denmark, Appendix 5, regarding PhD fellows, and with the current Circular of 11 December 2019 on the employment structure at Danish universities. Allocation of SU-PhD grants are according to the Ministerial Order on the State Educational Grant and Loan Scheme part 12, section II. This applies to integrated PhD stipends only.

Appointment and salary as a PhD fellow are according to the Ministry of Finance Circular of 15 December 2021 on the Collective Agreement for Academics in Denmark, Appendix 5, regarding PhD fellows, and with the current Circular of 11 December 2019 on the employment structure at Danish universities. Allocation of SU-PhD grants are according to the Ministerial Order on the State Educational Grant and Loan Scheme part 12, section II. This applies to integrated PhD stipends only.

Title: Python Applications Developer
Place: Esbjerg, Region of Southern Denmark, Denmark
Description:
Are you an engineer with expertise in Python, cloud architecture, and CI/CD pipelines, eager to solve complex problems? Then you are the one we are looking for!

Your position

In your new position as application developer in the Product Line Team within our Renewables Department, you will be a valuable member of a dedicated team whose mission is to drive innovation and efficiency in offshore substation design. You will have the chance to work with ParaPy, an advanced software platform that empowers engineers to create detailed parametric 3D models and automate engineering processes efficiently. Above all, your work will make a real change for the global green energy transition.

At Semco Maritime, safety is a core value, and in this role, you will contribute to maintaining and promoting a strong safety culture while delivering innovative solutions.

Your place of work will be at our Global HQ in Esbjerg, in Nordhavn (CPH), Denmark, in Gdynia, Poland or Hamburg, Germany. The position is full-time, and you can expect to travel occasionally as required.

Your Tasks & Responsibilities

As a application developer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining the ParaPy application, ensuring it aligns with business and engineering needs. You will work closely with engineers, architects, and managers to improve and refine our substation model.

Your Tasks Will Include But Are Not Limited To


Developing new features for the ParaPy application as required by the business.
Managing the building and release process of the ParaPy application.
Extending and maintaining our automated testing suite.
Translating engineering rules into code through scoping, clarification, and knowledge acquisition.
Building interfaces with other engineering applications.
Managing deployment and CI/CD pipelines to ensure seamless integration.


Your Profile & Qualifications

We are looking for an analytical and proactive engineer who is passionate about software development and automation in engineering processes. You should have a structured approach to problem-solving and a strong drive to innovate.

To succeed in this position, we imagine that you have:


A bachelor’s or master’s degree in a relevant engineering field.
At least 3 years of professional experience writing Python code and working with large code repositories.
Experience with cloud software (Azure), integrations between complex software solutions, and APIs.
Knowledge of UI web development frameworks (React) and UI/UX design principles.
Experience with software testing (PyTest), CI/CD pipelines, and Agile development tools (Jira, GitHub)
Knowledge of safety standards


Welcome to Semco Maritime

At Semco Maritime, we create change. For people. For projects. And for the global energy sector. With us, you will join a community of over 2,500 of the most dedicated thinkers and doers in the energy industry who are driving real change and making their own personal mark on the global energy landscape.

While everyone knows why the energy transition is vital, we are concerned with the journey. How to get there. By providing the answers needed to make change real. Because we believe that global energy ambitions can only be realized through hard work and clever pragmatic solutions. This is what we do. This is what we invite you to participate in.

Safety is at the core of everything we do, and we are committed to protecting our people, partners, and the planet as we work towards a sustainable energy future.

So yes, working for us will change the energy sector – and may well change you too.

Care to join the movement?

Change. With us.

We conduct our interviews on an ongoing basis, so if you are interested, you must submit your application as soon as possible via the link on the page.

If you have any questions, you are welcome to contact Head of Product Line Development, Stevan Akrap on +45 79 14 79 68.
